Description: The serial id for the device. Combine with the model number and model option for the full Serial Number.
The model number of the device.
The model option of the device.
The address of the device. This is the same for all Base Stations. Do Not Change.
The radio frequency of the device. Nodes on this same frequency can be communicated with.
The transmit output power of the radio.
The source of the beacon clock.
The firmware version of the device (Part 1).
The firmware version of the device (Part 2).
(LEGACY, Replaced by EEPROMs 46 + 48) The model number of the device.
(LEGACY, Replaced by EEPROM 20) The serial id for the device.
The id of the radio on the device.
The id of the microcontroller on the device.
The architecture version of the device used to determine which version of firmware can be applied to it.
Controls the LED action of the device.
Records the number  of times the device has been reset (both soft reset and power cycling).
Used to cycle the power on the device.
The region the device will be operated in.
The node address to associate with analog out, port 1.
The node channel number to associate with analog out, port 1.
The maximum float value if converting from float data with analog out, port 1.
The minimum float value if converting from float data with analog out, port 1.
The node address to associate with analog out, port 2.
The node channel number to associate with analog out, port 2.
The maximum float value if converting from float data with analog out, port 2.
The minimum float value if converting from float data with analog out, port 2.
